PHRASE.LANG: kName
Valentine In Love T-shirt
T-shirt Amoureuse à la St. Valentin
Valentinstag-T-Shirt 'Verliebt'
T-shirt san Valentino
Camiseta de Estoy enamorado
*Not Localised* Female01_Torso_inLove
발렌타인 사랑의 티셔츠 (여성)
Valentine In Love T-shirt (Women)
情人節戀愛中T恤（女用）
情人節戀愛中T恤（女用）
Valentine In Love T-shirt
kDesc
Show your loved ones how you feel about them with glowing heart T-shirt! [#Legal]
Montrez à votre chéri à quel point vous l'aimez grâce à ce magnifique t-shirt ! [#Legal]
Zeige allen, die du liebst, deine Gefühle in diesem T-Shirt mit einem leuchtenden Herzen! [#Legal]
Mostra i tuoi sentimenti alle persone che ami con la t-shirt dal cuore rosso! [#Legal]
¡Demuestra a tus seres amados lo que sientes por ellos con esta camiseta de corazón! [#Legal]
*Not Localised* Female01_Torso_inLove [#Legal]
반짝이는 하트 티셔츠로 당신만의 깊은 사랑을 표현해 주세요! [#Legal]
Show your loved ones how you feel about them with glowing heart T-shirt! [#Legal]
穿上這件有鮮明心型圖案的T恤，向您所愛的人表達心意！[#Legal]
穿上這件有鮮明心型圖案的T恤，向您所愛的人表達心意！[#Legal]
"Show your loved ones how you feel about them!" [#Legal]
